commandsListTooltip:
This bot was made for the Hypixel Translators Community and is maintained by %%developer%%. It's open-source and our GitHub repository can be found [here]%%github%%.
You can help translate the bot by following the instructions on the `/translate` command.

You can execute `/help <command>` to learn more about a specific command.
Below you can find a list of all the available pages. Use the buttons on this message to cycle through them.
staffOnly:
Denne kommando er kun tilgængelig for personalet, og derfor er dens oplysninger skjult.
Kontakt venligst en medarbejder, hvis du mener, at dette er en fejl.
inDev: Denne kommando er i udvikling og vil være tilgængelig på et senere tidspunkt!

descriptions.8ball: Magic 8 Ball, der vil besvare alle dine spørgsmål.
descriptions.alert: Alerts other proofreaders for issues in their translations
descriptions.feedback: Åbner vores GitHub-problem side, hvor du kan rapportere problemer eller sende feedback.
descriptions.help: Viser dig alle de tilgængelige kommandoer og andet information omkring botten.
descriptions.hypixelstats: Viser dig essentielle Hypixel statistiker for den angivne bruger.
descriptions.hypixelunverify: Unlinks your Discord account from your Minecraft account.
descriptions.hypixelverify: Links your Discord account with your Minecraft account.
descriptions.language: Skifter dit sprog, viser din nuværende sprogindstilling eller viser en liste over tilgængelige sprog.
descriptions.languagestats: Viser dig fremgangen for et sprog på alle de projekter, vi i øjeblikket støtter.
descriptions.mention: Nævner en sprogrolle med en valgfri besked.
descriptions.minecraft: Looks up a specific Minecraft player's name history or skin. This command is compatible with /hypixelverify, letting you look up a specific user's info if they're verified. The parameter `user` will always have priority over `username` and they are both optional if you're verified, otherwise, at least one is required.
descriptions.poll: Creates or manages polls on the server. Available to Hypixel Proofreaders and above. All votes on polls created using this command will be private until the poll is ended and the names of the voters will not be disclosed, only vote counts will be displayed.
descriptions.prefix: Lets you pick an appropriate prefix for your language(s). In order to get a custom prefix, execute `/prefix` and provide the regional code of your country's flag or its name on the `flags` parameter. You can add as many flags as you wish, separated by a space.
descriptions.profile: Gives you the link to your Crowdin profile if it's stored on our database. If it's not, you can execute `/help verify` to learn how to store your profile and update your roles.
descriptions.projects: Giver dig links og oplysninger om alle de oversættelsesprojekter, vi understøtter på serveren.
descriptions.quote: Shows a funny/weird/wise quote from the server.
descriptions.rank: Giver dig den aktuelle XP til dig selv eller en given bruger.
descriptions.settings: Changes or shows your settings on the bot
descriptions.tag: Sends a preset message, allowing you to notify a specific member when sending it.
descriptions.translate: Gives you useful information on how to translate the bot.
descriptions.verify: Automatically checks for changes on your Crowdin profile and gives you the appropriate roles. If your profile is not stored on our database, you can provide it as an argument in the command. To check if your profile is stored, execute `/profile`. Make sure you have DMs enabled from this server so that the bot can send you a message.
